Name: SYSTEM_PASSWORD
Comment: 4-Digits system password to configure settings

Name: SYSTEM_UI_TIMEOUT
Comment: Timeout value for UI displaying in seconds

Name: FRAME_RATE
Comment: Frame rate per second of screen update in Hz. 20Hz=50msec 50Hz=20msec

Name: PS_DATA_SAVE_ALWAYS_DURATION
Comment: Time duration of received PS data keep in milli-seconds to save on disk.

Name: PS_DATA_SAVE_EVENTS_DURATION_DEFAULT
Comment: Default time duration of event PS data keep in milli-seconds to save on disk.

Name: PS_DATA_SAVE_EVENTS_DURATION_LIMIT
Comment: Limit time duration of event PS data keep in milli-seconds to save on disk.

Name: ROI_OBJECT_MARKER_MARGIN
Comment: Margin of objects ROI marker.

Name: ROI_OBJECT_DETECT_POINTS_DISTANCE_MAX
Comment: Maximum distance of points to detect one object ROI.(5000=50cm=0.5meter)

Name: ROI_OBJECT_DETECT_DIAMETER_MIN
Comment: Minimum diameter of object to detect the object ROI.(2000=20cm=0.2meter)

Name: ROI_OBJECT_DETECT_TIME_MIN
Comment: Minimum time of object appearance to detect one object ROI.(unit is milli-seconds)

Name: ROI_OBJECT_NO_MARK_BIG_DIAMETER_MIN
Comment: Minimum Diameter of object to no maker display.(20000=200cm=2meter)

Name: Relay_Module_UART_port_name
Comment: UART port name of Relay module.

Name: Relay_Module_UART_baud_rate
Comment: UART baud rate of Relay module.

Name: Relay_Module_UART_parity
Comment: UART parity of Relay module.

Name: Relay_Module_UART_data_bits
Comment: UART baud rate of Relay module.

Name: Relay_Module_UART_stop_bits
Comment: UART stop bits of Relay module.

Name: C_RELAY_MODULE_INDICATOR_OFF_FILL
Comment: Color of fill of relay indicator box. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_RELAY_MODULE_INDICATOR_OFF_STROKE
Comment: Color of stroke of relay indicator box and text. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: SCREEN_BORDER_WIDTH
Comment: Border width of window of Windows. default = 8

Name: SCREEN_TITLE_HEIGHT
Comment: Title height of window of Windows. default = 31

Name: SCREEN_X_OFFSET
Comment: Adjuest X offset of window of Windows. default = 3

Name: SCREEN_Y_OFFSET
Comment: Adjuest Y offset of window of Windows. default = 5

Name: C_BG
Comment: Background color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_VERSION_DATE_TEXT
Comment: Color of version and date text. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_PS_DATA_ERR_TEXT
Comment: Error text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_NUM_PAD_NORMAL
Comment: Color of normal button of number pad. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_NUM_PAD_HIGHLIGHT
Comment: Color of highlighted button of number pad. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_NUM_PAD_TEXT
Comment: Color of text of number pad. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_NUM_PAD_BOX
Comment: Color of button box of number pad. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_UI_NUM_PAD_BOX
Comment: Weight of border lines of number pad.

Name: C_BUBBLE_INFO_RECT_FILL
Comment: Bubble info box fill color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_BUBBLE_INFO_RECT_STROKE
Comment: Bubble info box border color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_BUBBLE_INFO_TEXT
Comment: Bubble infor box text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_BUTTONS_NORMAL
Comment: Button normal background color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_BUTTONS_HIGHLIGHT
Comment: Button highlight background color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_BUTTONS_TEXT
Comment: Button text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_BUTTONS_BOX
Comment: Button box color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_UI_BUTTONS_BOX
Comment: Button box weight.

Name: C_PS_DATA_LINE
Comment: Scan points line default color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_PS_DATA_POINT
Comment: Scan point default color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_PS_DATA_LINE
Comment: Scan line and point default weight.

Name: C_PS_DATA_RECT_FILL
Comment: Scan info box fill color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_PS_DATA_RECT_STROKE
Comment: Scan info box border color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_PS_DATA_RECT_STROKE
Comment: Scan info box border line weight.

Name: C_PS_DATA_RECT_TEXT
Comment: Scan info box text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_GRID_LINE
Comment: Grid line color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_GRID_LINE
Comment: Grid line weight.

Name: C_GRID_TEXT
Comment: Grid text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_MESSAGE_BOX_FILL
Comment: Color of fill of message box. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_MESSAGE_BOX_TEXT
Comment: Color of text of message box. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_MESSAGE_BOX_RECT
Comment: Color of rect of message box. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_UI_MESSAGE_BOX_RECT
Comment: Weight of rect lines of message box.

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_TEXT
Comment: Interface menu text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_FILL_NORMAL
Comment: Interface menu fill color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_FILL_HIGHLIGHT
Comment: Interface menu hightlight color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_BORDER_ACTIVE
Comment: Interface menu border active color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_BORDER_NORMAL
Comment: Interface menu border normal color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_CURSOR
Comment: Interface menu cursor color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_BG_IMAGE_LINE
Comment: Line color of background image lines. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_BG_IMAGE_LINE
Comment: Line weight of background image lines.
